hotels.name: Park Grand Kensignton
hotels.description: Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Shaftesbury Kensington offer a flat screen TV, a minibar,air conditioning,24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service.

hotels.name: Novotel Paris Les Halles
hotels.description: The Novotel Paris Les Halles is a 4 star hotel in the centre of Paris with direct Metro and RER train connections to Charles de Gaulle and Orly airport.

hotels.name: Regent Berlin
hotels.description: For travelers visiting Berlin, Regent Berlin is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its luxury environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions.

hotels.name: Grand Hyatt
hotels.description: Located in the heart of Union Square, Grand Hyatt San Francisco offers magnificent city skyline and stunning bay views, modern accommodations with residential style amenities and state-of-the-art technology.
